subject: Horse Racing
Women and Girls
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Michelle Payne became the first female jockey to win the Melbourne Cup, Australia's richest horse race, when she rode a 100-1 outsider to victory.
snippet: Michelle Payne became the first female jockey to win the Melbourne Cup, Australia's richest horse race, when she rode a 100-1 outsider to victory.
